info: India's GDP growth rate accelerates to 7.2% in Q4, surpassing China's growth rate
India's foreign exchange reserves surge to a record high of $600 billion
India's manufacturing sector grows at its fastest pace in 14 months
India's exports rise 14.4% in February, driven by strong demand for electronics and textiles
India's inflation rate drops to a 12-month low of 4.4% in February
India's industrial production grows 5.2% in January, driven by strong growth in manufacturing and electricity sectors
India's services sector grows at its fastest pace in 12 months
India's government announces plans to invest $1.5 trillion in infrastructure development over the next five years
India's stock market hits a record high, driven by strong growth in IT and pharmaceutical sectors
India's government launches a new initiative to promote entrepreneurship and job creation in the country
